SEARCH
Package com.syncura360.controller

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.controller.PatientController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="*") @RequestMapping("/patient") public class PatientController extends Object
Controller for managing patient-related operations. Provides endpoints to add, modify, and fetch patient information.
Author:
Darsh-KP

  • Method Details

    • addPatient

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericMessageResponseDTO> addPatient(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid PatientFormDTO patientFormDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Endpoint to add a new patient. Validates the request body and attempts to create a new patient.
      Parameters:
      patientFormDTO - the DTO containing the details of the patient to be added (PatientFormDTO).
      bindingResult - the result of validating the patientFormDTO.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a GenericMessageResponseDTO with the outcome message.

    • modifyPatient

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericMessageResponseDTO> modifyPatient(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid PatientUpdateDTO patientUpdateDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Endpoint to modify an existing patient's information. Validates the request body and attempts to update the patient details.
      Parameters:
      patientUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the updated patient information (PatientUpdateDTO).
      bindingResult - the result of validating the patientUpdateDTO.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a GenericMessageResponseDTO with the outcome message.

    • getPatients

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PatientViewFetchContainer> getPatients()
      Endpoint to retrieve the list of all patients.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a PatientViewFetchContainer with the list of patients, or a 204 NO_CONTENT if no patients exist.

    • getPatientById

      @GetMapping("/{patient-id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SpecificPatientFetchDTO> getPatientById(@PathVariable("patient-id") Integer patientId)
      Endpoint to retrieve a specific patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient to be fetched.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a SpecificPatientFetchDTO with the patient's details, or a 404 NOT_FOUND if the patient does not exist.
